attributes.action: To Stop The Demolition and Redevelopment of Clarence Terrace Bus Garage
attributes.additional_details: To stop the demolition and redevelopment of Clarence Terrace Car park ex Bus Garage located at Clarence Terrace, Swansea City Centre for the Swansea Bus Museum to house vehicles for use at the Quadrant Bus Station to provide bus services to the Swansea area to brighten up the city and maintain heritage.
